description:
Make those portages with your 60L barrel a bit easier with this Quick Haul harness. The unique barrel cradling belt system spreads the load across your lower back and holds the barrel away from your spine for comfortable carry.

  • Easily rig your harness with 3 intuitive primary straps
  • Luxuriously wide dual density foam waist belt and 4 micro adjustments refine your fit
  • Heavy duty carry handles top and bottom
  • 3/4in. sternum strap with pea-less whistle side-squeeze buckle
  • Chest level D-ring attachment points
  • Barrel sold separately
name: North Water Quick Haul Harness
